DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy LATISSE® ( bimatoprost 0.03 % ) augmentation eyelash Korean woman .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy LATISSE® Augmentation Eyelashes Korean Subjects
DOC.criteria: Eyelash prominence assessment minimal moderate Of Korean ethnicity Any eye disease abnormality Any ocular surgery use eyelash extension eyelash growth product within 3 month Any permanent eyeliner within 5 year Eyelash implant kind Eyelash tint dye application within 2 month Use treatment may affect hair growth within 6 month
